ap.name: AP
ap.text: Distract, confuse and deflect: Inside Russia's disinformation playbook as its invasion of Ukraine enters a second year.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: The government's $52 billion investment to develop advanced computer chips has become a rare source of bipartisan agreement in Congress. The Biden administration says the U.S. needs a whole-of-society effort for the investments to succeed.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: The number of U.S. mass killings linked to extremism over the past decade was at least three times higher than in any other 10-year period since the 1970s. A report from the Anti-Defamation League says Americans live in an age of extremist mass killings.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: Russia has used disinformation to justify its invasion of Ukraine, to silence dissent at home and to sow discord among its adversaries. But its assault on the truth hasn't always succeeded.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: Democrats recently celebrated the 100th judicial confirmation of Joe Biden’s presidency and are clamoring for more. To get there, some senators are flirting with ending a century-long Senate practice that allows a senator to make or break a nomination.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: Sanctions on Russia may not have delivered the economic "knockout" many government officials predicted. As Russia’s invasion of Ukraine enters its second year, Biden administration officials promise to deliver more financial penalties on the Kremlin.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: President Biden said Russian President Putin made a "mistake” by suspending his country's participation in the last remaining U.S.-Russia nuclear arms control treaty. Biden, in Poland, condemned Russia's choice to pull back from the New START treaty.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: U.S. Sen. Jon Tester of Montana says he’ll seek reelection to a fourth term in 2024. The Democrat’s announcement boosts his party’s chances of holding the seat as it tries to hang on to a narrow Senate majority.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: Jill Biden will be making her sixth visit to Africa when she arrives in Namibia. She is also set to visit Kenya as part of a commitment by President Joe Biden to deepen U.S. engagement with the fast-growing region.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: Thousands of hours of surveillance footage from the attack on the U.S. Capitol are being made available to Fox News host Tucker Carlson. The stunning level of access granted by House Speaker Kevin McCarthy is raising alarms about safety and security.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: U.S. officials say Russia is the world's most heavily sanctioned country. But as the war with Ukraine nears the one-year mark, it's clear Western sanctions haven’t packed the instantaneous punch that many have hoped.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: The Supreme Court will be weighing whether Facebook, Twitter and YouTube can be held responsible for a 2017 terrorist attack on a nightclub in Turkey. It’s the second case this week that questions liability issues for internet platforms.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: Thousands of hours of surveillance footage from the attack on the U.S. Capitol are being made available to Fox News host Tucker Carlson. The stunning level of access granted by House Speaker Kevin McCarthy is raising alarms about safety and security.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: President Joe Biden is wrapping up his whirlwind, four-day visit to Poland and Ukraine. He's reassuring eastern flank NATO allies that the U.S. is highly attuned to the looming threats and other impacts spurred by the grinding war with Russia.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: A liberal Milwaukee judge and a conservative former state Supreme Court justice won a primary to face off in a pivotal Wisconsin Supreme Court race that will determine majority control.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: BREAKING: Democrat Jennifer McClellan wins special election to U.S. House in Virginia's 4th Congressional District. #APRaceCall at 7:22 p.m. EST.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: The Supreme Court has heard arguments in the first case about the federal law that helped create the modern internet, and several justices suggested that Congress, not the courts, should resolve the issue.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: The Supreme Court is taking up its first case about a federal law that is credited with helping create the modern internet. The law shields Google and other companies from lawsuits over content posted on their sites by others.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: A member of the grand jury that investigated whether Donald Trump and others illegally meddled in the 2020 election in Georgia wouldn’t say if the panel recommended charges for Trump. But in an interview with @AP, she provided insight into the process.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: Kari Lake lost the race for Arizona governor last year, but she has built a loyal following that stretches far beyond the state. Her next move might involve a run for the U.S. Senate or, some speculate, national office.

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
💉 Posts claim a recent scientific paper shows the risk of myocarditis is higher following Covid-19 vaccination than infection. 

This is false, according to the lead researcher and other studies

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
🪖 #Information warfare in #Ukraine
🕵️ Read some of the main narratives, false or misleading, that have been #factchecked over the past year by our digital investigation teams @AFPFactCheck.
👉 

#Disinformation #UkraineRussiaWar #FactChecking

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
The derailment of a cargo train in East Palestine, Ohio has prompted legitimate concerns about the health of residents and the environmental fallout from the release of hazardous chemicals. 

But our team has also debunked misinformation about the disaster 🧵👇

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
Did the @NgLabour fail to register monitors in 75% of Nigeria's polling stations ahead of Saturday's elections?

No, @inecnigeria released a report showing that the party registered enough agents for more than three-quarters of all polling stations.

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: ⚠️ Video shows football fans celebrating Africa Cup win in Paris, not migrants making violent threats

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: 🇮🇳 Posts about 'knife-wielding man in India's Uttar Pradesh' show video from different state

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: Video of a pair of highways from China has been falsely shared as a road project in Indonesia. 🇮🇩

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: 🇲🇾 Posts falsely claim that Malaysian bubble tea brand 'declared not halal'

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: ☀️ Posts attacking South Korea solar panel drive falsely share video from China

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
Social media users have falsely claimed a study shows eggs can prevent Covid-19 in humans.

In fact, the study's authors told AFP it was not done on humans.

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
A widely shared image purports to show Volodymyr Zelensky holding Joe Biden's hand in Ukraine.

But the image is a manipulated version of a New York Times picture. The photographer confirmed to me the original does not show a hand hold, but was altered.

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
Keir Starmer's five missions speech fact-checked 

#BBCRealityCheck

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and Labour leader Sir Keir Starmer have set out five key pledges - how do they compare?

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Eating turnips could help ease vegetable shortage, suggests Environment Secretary Therese Coffey

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Kate Forbes says she feels "greatly burdened" that some of her comments, made on gay marriage and having children outside of marriage, during the SNP leadership contest have caused hurt

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Sir Keir Starmer vows to make the UK the fastest growing major economy by the end of a first Labour term in government

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Plans for new regulator of English football clubs confirmed by government

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
Number of asylum seekers waiting for a decision in the UK soars to record high of around 166,000

Almost 110,000 have been waiting for six months or more

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Shortages of some fruit and vegetables could last for up to a month, Environment Secretary Therese Coffey says

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Defence Secretary Ben Wallace dismisses criticism from veterans' minister Johnny Mercer of Mr Wallace's efforts to secure more armed forces funding

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Conservative MP Vicky Ford says councils should be able to insist office conversions include a portion of affordable housing

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Plans to scrap EU laws after Brexit will concentrate too much power in the hands of Welsh and UK government ministers, report says

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Keir Starmer’s ‘missions’ in Manchester — our early write up here @BBCNews @BBCPolitics:

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
"A Britain that gets its future back... we're going to transform the way Britain does its business," says Labour leader Sir Keir Starmer

"A relentless focus on a clear set of priorities, an answer to the widespread call to fix the fundamentals," he says

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
Would Labour increase corporation tax? asks @ChrisMasonBBC

"Corporation tax is going to go up, but actually that isn't the thing that most people are talking about," Labour leader Sir Keir Starmer says business leaders are thinking more about UK stability

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
"There is a massive role for the private sector in mission-driven government," says Labour leader Sir Keir Starmer

But, he says, if the goal is "to replace the public sector while extracting a rent... that takes us nowhere"

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: 10-page form to replace face-to-face interviews for 12,000 asylum seekers

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Rishi Sunak holds call with Northern Ireland business leaders as talks on protocol continue

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Blackpool Council's Tory group leader resigns after falling out with Blackpool South Conservative MP Scott Benton

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
Blocking clubs from joining a breakaway European Super League will be among the powers held by a new independent regulator.

Minister for Sport Stuart Andrew spoke to #BBCBreakfast about the Government's plans for football in England

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
'We didn't like each other Boris Johnson and I, we didn't get on'

Labour leader Keir Starmer told #BBCBreakfast why he said he 'loathes' former Prime Minister Boris Johnson

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
We're concerned by fresh threats to the independence & sustainability of our Israeli Member KAN

Impartial news & information are critical to a healthy democracy and we call on the Israeli government to safeguard the independence of #PublicServiceMedia

▶️

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Our annual #news report looks at issues for newsrooms - and finds solutions

This extract on #leadership from 2021/22 is a 👌 example➡️

It's the same expert analysis you'll find in our new report on #climate #journalism available 1 March💡 

Don't miss it!

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Tomorrow marks 1 year since the war in #Ukraine began. #PublicServiceMedia have played a critical role in providing trusted #news and information to citizens both in Ukraine and across the continent.

Find out how they're marking the anniversary:

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text: We want to #ActNow! identify innovative front runner projects, share our experiences, and start new international initiatives. At the @UNESCO #InternetForTrust conference we discussed next steps towards a Digital Public Sphere for the Public Good. #AEuropeanPerspective @EBU_HQ

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Last year,  the #EU adopted the #DigitalServicesAct w/ new rules for how online platforms treat illegal content online

Find out what the #DSA means for #PublicServiceMedia!

Read our DSA Handbook:

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
#Happy90thNinaSimone! 

Celebrate the life and music of one of the world’s greatest artists.

29 public service radios are broadcasting Nina's live concert in Hamburg in 1988, from the archives of @EBU_HQ's Member NDR.

Tune in 🎧:

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Are you a #journalist interested in improving your #migration reporting?

Our #eMediaToolkit with new examples from @georgrestle @wdr & @JoseAntonio_BG @publico_es will help you lead the narrative on #migrationjournalism.

🔗
@EBU_HQ @EJNetwork @UNmigration

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Come celebrate female musicians with us in the lead-up to #InternationalWomensDay! 

🗓️ 1 Mar 2023 15:30 - 16:30 CET 
👉 Register by 28 Feb: 

(EBU Member exclusive)
 #IWD2023 #EmbraceEquity @fionatalkington @BBCRadio3 @NRKno @tineskolmen #WomenInMusic

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
“It’s one of the few places you can express your national identity in a safe space that isn’t a sports environment” 

Hear Dave Goodman, from the European Broadcasting Union, on why he believes Eurovision is so appealing to LGBTQ+ communities, on the latest #Eurovisioncast...

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Earlier, we welcomed a delegation from @Arcom_fr, the French #media regulator

Our DG, Noel Curran, together with Roch-Olivier Maistre, President, discussed THE crucial topics affecting #publicservicemedia

#MediaFreedomAct, #AVMS Directive, broadcasting trends and more

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
We see that tampering by big tech of #PublicServiceMedia content & services needs oversight, which is why we contributed to @UNESCO 's Guidelines for digital platforms. 

More here⬇️


Also, join @BXLNicola at the #Internet4Trust conference on 21-23 Feb

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
73% of women journalists have faced online violence in their work, according to 'The Chilling', a new global report from @ICFJ and @UNESCO.

Join us online on 6 March to learn how orgs can keep their staff safe.

Register now: 

#OurJournalistsOurFreedom

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
In #Belarus, Polish minority journalist Andrzej Poczobu has been sentenced to 8 yrs in prison accused of 'inciting hatred'

This is yet another example of government attempts to repress #PressFreedom and we call on authorities to release him and all other journalists in captivity

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
We're excited to announce that Evan Shapiro @eshap will be our keynote at this year's Media Summit!

He's one of the #media industry's most influential and thought-provoking figures

But don't take our word for it...Register here ➡️ 

📸 ©️ THIS Conference

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
At 0️⃣8️⃣:4️⃣5️⃣ CET today, over 100 European public radios will unite in solidarity with Türkiye and Syria by playing "People Help The People" by @birdy 

This initiative is 🙏 to our Member @3FM 🇳🇱

We hope you can join us for this moment

#Syria #Türkiye #Earthquake #Radio

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text: Very proud of the work my @EBU_HQ colleague @BLG_EVNNews and everyone at the #EBUInvestigativeJournalismNetwork put into this critically important project

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Where are the #missingchildren of #Ukraine?

Our Investigative Journalism Network has examined evidence from official Russian outlets about 100s of Ukrainian kids transferred to #Russia...

The results are chilling

More➡️

#RussiaUkraineWar #news

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
This #ValentinesDay, find out what #AEuropeanPerspective is offering audiences:

😍Pan-European newsroom with 15 media orgs
😘 escape from the 'news bubble' 
🥰development of a public service algorithm

& more:  💟

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text: Don't miss this session from 4-5pm CET today on #sustainability in the media industry with our Sustainability Lead, Hemini Mehta ⬇️⬇️

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text: How important is public radio broadcast in a war conflict when public media in many countries serve as war propaganda tool? At the occasion of #WorldRadioDay  we asked both @EBU_HQ as well as @UNESCO

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.text:
Now you can tap with your finger 👉 instead of your controllers on @MetaQuestVR — so navigating #virtualreality feels as natural as swiping through your phone.

Read more:

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.text: Imagine if you could BECOME the Super Hero of your favorite video game. Join @kekepalmer and Marvel’s Iron Man VR developer Ryan Payton to learn how!

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.text:
.@ray_ban Stories let you take photos and videos of the world without having to hold another device — like snapping a photo of your dog while playing together or recording a video while skiing.

Get an inside look at how we built them:

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.text:
Want to feel the glory of throwing a clutch touchdown in a sold-out stadium? 

See how #VR puts you in the shoes of your favorite athletes with @KekePalmer and @Hawk #NFLProEra 🏈

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.text:
Love for your @instagram can now put some money 🤑in your pocket.

More eligible creators in the US can receive gifts 🎁 from followers that can result in earning money 💸

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.text:
.@facebook now has 2 billion actives every day 🌏

Whether you’re creating recipe reels or sharing photos from your latest trip, you can discover and engage with communities, friends and family that share your interests.

What have you discovered on Facebook? 👇

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.text: In NY but your bestie is in LA? @KekePalmer & @ElevatedTrash show you how to join friends at concerts in VR! Learn more about immersive music experiences on “Are We There Yet?”

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text:
1/12 🚨 Organization news!

First Draft's mission is moving to @Brown_SPH as part of a new initiative being launched today - the Information Futures Lab (@IFL_Brown). See letter from @cward1e for details.

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text:
During this #auspol election, our research found that conspiracy theorists primarily attacked the legitimacy of the AEC to advance baseless claims of election fraud. Read more here: 

h/t @estherswchan @stevievzh @juliabergin1 @annekrugernews

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text:
'First Draft’s monitoring documented a treasure trove of conspiratorial content, scare campaigns, and misinformation relating to the electoral process.' 

Read more about what we found during the 2022 Australian federal election #auspol #ausvotes22:

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: A @firstdraftnews manifesto (of sorts) following months of monitoring misinfo during the #AusVotes22 election. The team @estherswchan, @stevievzh and @annekrugernews noted narratives old and new, Aus-made and imported, trumpeted on trucks and in Telegram throughout the campaign.

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text:
Findings from months of #auspol monitoring and analysis in the article 👇 

Thrilled to be working with @annekrugernews @stevievzh @juliabergin1 on this

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: @firstdraftnews @estherswchan @juliabergin1 @annekrugernews At @firstdraftnews we advocate for a preemptive approach to countering such narratives. Misinfo is too large for any single newsroom to tackle, so we brought together journos and community groups, alerting them to emerging narratives so that they can consider how to prebunk ASAP

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: @firstdraftnews @estherswchan @juliabergin1 @annekrugernews Election misinfo has become a fixture across the world. Claims of "rigged" elections have been repeated not just in this and the US election, but also the Myanmar coup, this year's French and Filipino elections, and have already begun to emerge ahead of Brazil's later this year

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: @firstdraftnews @estherswchan @juliabergin1 @annekrugernews We summarise the main themes of mis/disinfo throughout this period, which includes narratives of voter fraud from both local contexts & imported from overseas, conspiracy theories about the WHO, scare campaigns using online & offline channels, and disinfo through online ads.

google.name: Google
google.text: Give your @GoogleChrome browser an update for #BlackHistoryMonth. We commissioned custom themes from three Black artists that were curated by featured artist Abelle Hayford. These themes drew inspiration from the #DrawingWhileBlack hashtag. Learn more.

youtube.name: YouTube
youtube.text: looking for some new channels lol drop some recs plz!!

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: Crisis-hit #SriLanka has approved a $442-million wind power project of #AdaniGreenEnergy, barely a month since the Indian conglomerate’s stocks plummeted following U.S.-based short-seller #Hindenburg’s damaging report on the Group. @Meerasrini reports

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: The #TN Police assured Madras HC that it shall provide necessary protection to a 23-year-old woman from Madhya Pradesh who had fled her home to escape from being killed by her stepmother, a proponent of black magic, as part of a human sacrifice ritual.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: The Bachpan Bachao Andolan has rescued over 1,600 children from trafficking in collaboration with the RPF in Rajasthan during the last two years. It has been claimed to be one of the largest operations in the world undertaken to check #childtrafficking.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: Armed with swords, guns and sharp weapons, supporters of the self-styled Sikh preacher and pro-Khalistan (sovereign state for Sikhs) propagator #AmritpalSingh indulged in a scuffle with Punjab police personnel, injuring a few in Ajnala. @vasudevavikas

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: #PawanKhera arrest | The #BJP on Thursday stated that the #Congress leaders “should not live under the misconception that they were above the law”, criticising them for agitating on the tarmac of the Delhi airport.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: In a clear signal to the party that #Congress president #MallikarjunKharge is firmly placed in the driving seat, the Gandhi family are likely to skip the party’s steering committee meeting at the 85th Plenary in Raipur at 10 a.m. today. @SobhanaNair

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: Actor #AlecBaldwin has pleaded not guilty to felony charges of involuntary manslaughter in the shooting death of a cinematographer on the set of a Western movie and waived his first formal court appearance, in court documents filed Thursday.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: India abstained in the U.N. General Assembly on February 23 on a resolution that underscored the need to reach as soon as possible a “comprehensive, just and lasting peace” in #Ukraine in line with the principles of the U.N. Charter.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: As the war in #Ukraine completes one year, apprehensions of delays in delivery of spares, components and ammunition have further heightened for the #IndianArmy's forces.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: The #TamilNadu Police assured the #MadrasHighCourt that it shall provide necessary protection to a 23-year-old woman from #MadhyaPradesh who had fled her home to escape from being killed by her stepmother as part of a human sacrifice ritual.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: The violence of the 2020 #Delhi riots, which lasted from February 23 to 27, led to the deaths of 53 people (38 Muslim victims and 15 Hindus) and left hundreds injured. "It’s easy to start a riot but the after-effects linger on," said Ram Prakash.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: Home delivery of food is probably one of the best things technology has gifted us. #Hyderabad-based  is a platform that offers food you cannot find in restaurants, ranging from Mediterranean to American.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: The Greater #Chennai Corporation is set to start earning money from trading of #carbon credits in the international market by identifying projects for bio mining, sewage treatment, and solid waste management.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: Ramanan Selvam, a mechanical engineer from #Chennai with a passion for travelling, goes on an expedition to #Antarctica and writes a book. "I thought Antarctica needed more mental power and strength. Age was on my side."

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: In 2020, as the pandemic and lockdown played out, artist and collector Shalini Passi ran out of canvas. So, she began to think about capturing modern #Delhi through a lens. Titled ‘Forever Delhi’, the series is on display at the India Design ID 2023.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: Lack of adequate lung spaces is something with which most north #Chennai residents can relate to. But work is in progress on several new parks and the existing ones are being spruced up in many parts of north Chennai under the Singara Chennai 2.0 project.

hindu.name: The Hindu

reuters_institute.text:
Join us for our 2023 Reuters Memorial Lecture with award-winning Nicaraguan editor Carlos F. Chamorro (@cefeche)

🗓️ 6 March 2023, 17:30 (UK time)

🎫 Join us in Oxford: 

🖥️ Follow online: 

#RISJMemLecture
More details in thread 👇

I will be honored to give the 2023 Reuters Memorial Lecture at Oxford University.  It will be a privilege to talk about the endeavors of

wapo.text: Pentagon military planners constantly anticipate various forms of enemy incursions or attacks on U.S. airspace. Even so, the arrival last month of a Chinese high-altitude balloon called for a measure of creativity, putting weapons to an unfamiliar test.

wapo.text: Americans spend more hours at work than people in many other countries. If you’re having trouble making time for a break, recent research suggests that simply treating your weekends like a vacation can make you happier.
